title: Rav Mazuz Slams Israel Judiciary
body: Rav Tzemach Mazuz, rosh yeshiva of Yeshivas Kisei Rachamim, attacks Israel's judicial system over Prime Minister Binyamin Netanyahu's trial. The remarks come after US President Donald Trump sent a formal clemency request for Netanyahu.

title: German Auction House Cancels Sale
body: Polish officials, Holocaust survivors, and memory orgs pressure German auction house to cancel sale of Holocaust-era items, including yellow badges and Nazi docs.
